name: Body and Mind
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2022

You are Roger, you wake up in a futuristic city with a flame body and no memories. Go along the level, fight enemies, explore the Soul world and try to understand what is going on (frankly, we don't really know either) while making game altering choices.

---------
Controls:
WASD/ZQSD/Arrows : Move around

LSHIFT: Run

E : Interact/Attack

Tab: Switch between body and mind

---------

Credits:

Pordrack: Programming

Gohuteur: Sprites and music

Obiasnara: Programming

Some sprites like the background or the robot where taken from the internet, the same goes for the sound effects.

The base sprite of Roger come from a previous project but has been heavily modified for this occasion.
The music was also made prior to the jam (but modified a bit for it)

---------

The level is a little too short and some glitches are still here, which is why we'd like to release a post jam version in the future.
